verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H376>them,<s%> 'When any <S%H376>man<s%> has a <S%H2100>discharge<s%> from his <S%H1320>body,<s%> because of his <S%H2100>discharge<s%> he is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

This shall be his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> in his <S%H2101>discharge:<s%> whether his <S%H1320>body<s%> <S%H7325>runs<s%> with his <S%H2101>discharge,<s%> or his <S%H1320>body<s%> has <S%H2856>stopped<s%> from his <S%H2101>discharge,<s%> it is his <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%>

<S%H4904><s%>"'Every bed whereon he who has the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> and <S%H3627>everything<s%> he <S%H3427>sits<s%> on shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

<S%H376>Whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> his <S%H4904>bed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

He who <S%H3427>sits<s%> on <S%H3627>anything<s%> whereon the man who has the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H5060><s%>"'He who touches the <S%H1320>body<s%> of him who has the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H2100><s%>"'If he who has the discharge <S%H7556>spits<s%> on him who is <S%H2889>clean,<s%> then he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>
<S%H4817><s%>"'Whatever saddle he who has the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H7392>rides<s%> on shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

Whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> anything that was under him shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%> He who <S%H5375>carries<s%> those things shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H2100><s%>"'Whoever he who has the discharge <S%H5060>touches,<s%> without having <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H3627><s%>"'The earthen vessel, which he who has the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H5060>touches,<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken;<s%> and every <S%H3627>vessel<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> shall be <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> in <S%H4325>water.<s%>

<S%H2100><s%>"'When he who has a discharge is <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> of his <S%H2100>discharge,<s%> then he shall <S%H5608>count<s%> to himself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing,<s%> and <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes;<s%> and he shall <S%H3526>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

<S%H8066><s%>"'On the eighth <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H3548>priest:<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>them,<s%> the one for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for his <S%H2101>discharge.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If any man <S%H3318>has<s%> an <S%H7902>emission<s%> of <S%H2233>semen,<s%> then he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> all his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

Every <S%H899>garment,<s%> and every <S%H5785>skin,<s%> whereon <S%H7902>the<s%> <S%H2233>semen<s%> <S%H3526>is,<s%> shall be washed with <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> and there is an <S%H7902>emission<s%> of <S%H2233>semen,<s%> they shall both <S%H7364>bathe<s%> themselves in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H802><s%>"'If a woman has a <S%H2100>discharge,<s%> and her <S%H2100>discharge<s%> in her <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H1818>blood,<s%> she shall be in her <S%H5079>impurity<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> and whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> her shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>
<S%H7901><s%>"'Everything that she lies on in her <S%H5079>impurity<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> Everything also that she <S%H3427>sits<s%> on shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

Whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> her <S%H4904>bed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

Whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3627>anything<s%> that she <S%H3427>sits<s%> on shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>
If it is on the <S%H4904>bed,<s%> or on <S%H3627>anything<s%> whereon she <S%H3427>sits,<s%> when he <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H2930>it,<s%> he shall be unclean until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If any man <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>with<s%> <S%H5079>her,<s%> and her monthly flow is on <S%H2930>him,<s%> he shall be unclean <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and every <S%H4904>bed<s%> whereon he <S%H7901>lies<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

<S%H802><s%>"'If a woman <S%H2100>has<s%> a <S%H2101>discharge<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of her <S%H5079>period,<s%> or if she has a <S%H2100>discharge<s%> beyond the <S%H5921>time<s%> of her <S%H5079>period;<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2101>discharge<s%> of her <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> shall be as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5079>period:<s%> she is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

Every <S%H4904>bed<s%> whereon she <S%H7901>lies<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2101>discharge<s%> shall be to her as the <S%H4904>bed<s%> of her <S%H5079>period:<s%> and <S%H3627>everything<s%> whereon she <S%H3427>sits<s%> shall be <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> as the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of her <S%H5079>period.<s%>

Whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> these things shall be <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H2891><s%>"'But if she is cleansed of her <S%H2101>discharge,<s%> then she shall <S%H5608>count<s%> to herself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that she shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

On the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> she shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> them to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H2403>offering;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for her <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of her <S%H2101>discharge.<s%>

<S%H5144><s%>"'Thus you shall separate the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from their <S%H2932>uncleanness,<s%> so they will not <S%H4191>die<s%> in their <S%H2932>uncleanness,<s%> when they <S%H2930>defile<s%> my <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> that is in their <S%H8432>midst.<s%>'"
This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of him who has a <S%H2100>discharge,<s%> and of him who has an <S%H3318>emission<s%> of <S%H2233>semen,<s%> so that he is unclean <S%H2930>thereby;<s%>

and of her who <S%H1739>has<s%> her <S%H5079>period,<s%> and of a <S%H2145>man<s%> or <S%H5347>woman<s%> who <S%H2100>has<s%> a <S%H2101>discharge,<s%> and of <S%H376>him<s%> who <S%H7901>lies<s%> with her who is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>
